title: Da Shipu season2
synopsis: There is a world in which thousands of continents float in the universe like floating islands, and they can only be connected by the Milky Way belt. The Milky Way Belt is moving all the time, entering the Milky Way, it is very likely that it will never return to the original world. A traveler and a chef met here. They carried a big cookbook, traveled across the galaxy and embarked on a fantastic food journey. The transparent fish eggs hanging in the air, the longevity slurry mist deposited on the bottom of the valley, the giant shrimp hidden in the rocks, the gorgeous aurora that can be touched...(translated from douban)
